title: Strengthening Programming Competencies: Enhancing Management Leadership in the Digital Age via Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain at least three leadership strategies required in a digital management environment.
Learners will be able to analyze real-world business cases based on peer feedback in an online discussion platform.
Learners will be able to submit project deliverables within 24 hours of completing a microlearning module.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
